name: Mono (itch) (Augusto Brito)
description:
The game consists of using only one ability per time trying to reach the diamonds and be able to collect them. So you have to sacrifice one ability to get another.

CONTROLS
WASD or ARROW KEYS - Movement and Jump
SPACE or CONTROL - Trigger Ability

NOTE
First of all I would like to clarify that this game was made in only 24 hours that I was available this weekend. The game is not finished, I plan to do it next weekend.
